alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Newton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 6:25PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cherokee, northwestern Newton and southwestern Jasper Counties through 700 PM CST... At 625 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fairland, or near Miami, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Joplin, Carthage, Webb City, Baxter Springs, Galena, Seneca, Duquesne, Duenweg, Diamond, Loma Linda, Airport Drive, Leawood, Lowell, Silver Creek, Shoal Creek Drive, Saginaw, Fidelity, Redings Mill, Treece and Grand Falls Plaza. This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 between mile markers 0 and 18. Interstate 49 between mile markers 28 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for southeastern Kansas.
